data.actual_result: It doesn't show anybody until you click on another tab and go back to Audit Logs
data.expected_result: It shows a list users that did stuff worthy logging
data.short_description: Filter by User shows no users (or users from another server) when opening Audit Logs from a server context menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click a server's icon or name where you have permission to view audit logs - Click Filter by User
